## Usage

Hereâ€™s a simple example to get started with the background removal feature. For your inforamtion, there is a Sample Usage repository in this organization.:
```python
from attentionme import *

image_path = 'sample_images/group1.jpg'
output_path = 'image_outputs/removed_background_image.png'

remove_background(image_path, output_path)
```
